Body:
X = load_wn18()
model = ConvE(batches_count=200, seed=22, epochs=1, k=10,
    embedding_model_params={'conv_filters': 16, 'conv_kernel_size': 3},
    optimizer='adam', optimizer_params={'lr': 0.01}, loss='bce',
    loss_params={}, regularizer=None, regularizer_params={'p': 2, 'lambda':
    1e-05}, verbose=True, low_memory=True)
model.fit(X['train'])
y1 = model.predict(X['test'][:5])
save_model(model, 'model.tmp')
del model
model = restore_model('model.tmp')
y2 = model.predict(X['test'][:5])
assert np.all(y1 == y2)
os.remove('model.tmp')
